text: wala takuluu -ayha almslmwn- min aldhbayh alty lam yudhkar asm allah ealayha eind aldhbh, kalmytt wama dhubih llawthan waljn, waghayr dhlk, wa'iin al'ukul min tilk aldhbayh lkhrwj ean taeat allah teala. wa'iin mrdt aljini layulqwn 'iilaa 'awliayihim min shayatin al'iins balshbhat hawl tahrim 'akl almytt, fyamrwnhm 'an yaquluu lilmuslimin fi jdalhm mehm: 'iinakum bieadam aklkm almaytat la takulun ma qatalah allh, baynama takulun mimaa tdhbhwnh, wa'iin 'ataetumuhum -ayha almuslimun fi tahlil almytt- fa'antum wahum fi alshirk swa'
